title: Real-time Traffic Sign Detection
description: Detect and classify traffic signs in real-time for safer and smarter roads using computer vision.

title: High Accuracy in Diverse Environments
description: Achieve high accuracy in detecting traffic signs under different environmental conditions.

title: Optimized for Low-Power Edge Devices
description: The model is optimized to run efficiently on edge devices with limited processing power.

title: Detects Regulatory, Warning, and Informational Signs
description: Classify a variety of traffic signs including regulatory, warning, and informational types.

title: Essential for Autonomous Vehicle Safety
description: Critical for the safety systems in autonomous vehicles by detecting road signs in real time.

title: Edge Computing for Traffic Sign Detection
description: Leverage edge computing techniques to process traffic sign data locally for faster decisions.
